title: Quick Take: Violence on the Trail
description: At Donald Trump campaign events over the weekend, protesters clashed with police and Trump supporters. Campaign reporter Asma Khalid and editor/correspondent Ron Elving discuss what happened and how the candidates in both parties have responded. Find the NPR Politics team on Twitter, at nprpolitics.org, or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
